title: Developing Extension error - Deployment artifact xxx is missing the following dependencies from its configuration
body:
### Describe the bug

Getting error while building custom extension.

Console output

[INFO] quarkus-extension-atom ............................. SUCCESS [  0.280 s]
[INFO] quarkus-extension-atom-example ..................... SUCCESS [  0.842 s]
[INFO] quarkus-extension-atom-parent ...................... SUCCESS [  0.008 s]
[INFO] quarkus-extension-atom-anonymiser .................. SUCCESS [  0.008 s]
[INFO] quarkus-extension-atom-anonymiser-core ............. SUCCESS [  1.507 s]
[INFO] Anonymiser-Mask - Parent ........................... SUCCESS [  0.011 s]
[INFO] Anonymiser-Mask - Runtime .......................... FAILURE [  2.132 s]
[INFO] Anonymiser-Mask - Deployment ....................... SKIPPED


[ERROR] Failed to execute goal io.quarkus:quarkus-extension-maven-plugin:2.14.0.Final:extension-descriptor (default) on project quarkus-extension-atom-anonymiser-mask-runtime: Deployment artifact org.quarkus.extension.atom:quarkus-extension-atom-anonymiser-mask-runtime-deployment::jar:1.0-SNAPSHOT is missing the following dependencies from its configuration: org.quarkus.extension.atom:quarkus-extension-atom-anonymiser-mask-runtime::jar, io.quarkus:quarkus-arc-deployment::jar, io.quarkus:quarkus-core-deployment::jar, io.quarkus:quarkus-config-yaml-deployment::jar, io.quarkus:quarkus-resteasy-deployment::jar, io.quarkus:quarkus-vertx-http-deployment::jar, io.quarkus:quarkus-mutiny-deployment::jar, io.quarkus:quarkus-smallrye-context-propagation-deployment::jar, io.quarkus:quarkus-vertx-deployment::jar, io.quarkus:quarkus-netty-deployment::jar, io.quarkus:quarkus-resteasy-server-common-deployment::jar, io.quarkus:quarkus-resteasy-common-deployment::jar -> [Help 1]


### Expected behavior

The build should be successful

### Actual behavior

build fails with error

### How to Reproduce?

Reproducer:    https://github.com/techpleiad/core-quarkus.git 

Steps to reproduce - 

1) Clone and switch to branch dev_maven
2) run mvn clean install


### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

_No response_

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)
